name: rainbow moss stitch blanket
notes:
[direct pdf][1]

approx 27" x 30" / 68.5cm x 76cm

caron simply soft
315yrds/288m (6oz/170g)
main color (mc) white (39701) - 2 balls

caron little crafties 
63yrds/58m (.7oz/20g)
20 multi-pack of mini 20 gram balls - 1 pkg.
will use these 11 colors:
contrast a : red, pink, orange, lemon yellow, soft green, kelly green, 
mint green, light blue, dark blue, light purple, dark purple

size u.s. h/8 (5 mm) crochet hook

gauge: 
20 sts and 20 rows = 4"/10 cm in pattern (moss stitch)


also available at [yarnspirations][2]


  [1]: https://daisyfarmcrafts.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/07/rainbow-moss-blanket-pdf.pdf
  [2]: https://www.yarnspirations.com/caron-rainbow-moss-stitch-blanket/cac0502-032268m.html
